trans-unit.source: Manages serialization plug-ins created, using <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref>, by manufacturers who have their own proprietary serialization formats.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider"></xref> class.
Only fully trusted callers can create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>.

Initializes an object derived from the abstract <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref> class for the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> that will use the specified descriptor.
Only fully trusted applications can call CreateSerializerWriter.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> that contains serialization information for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref>.
The <xref:System.IO.Stream> to which the returned object writes.
An object of a class derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter"></xref>.
One of the parameters is null.
The serializerDescriptor is specifying the wrong version.
-or- It is not registered.
-or- The assembly file cannot be found.
-or- The assembly cannot be loaded.
Gets a collection of the installed plug-in serializers.
A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> objects already registered.
Registers a serializer plug-in.
Only fully trusted callers can use this method.

The method will interpret an already registered plug-in as the same one if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> for the plug-in.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to overwrite an existing registration for the same plug-in; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
See Remarks.
serializerDescriptor is null.
overwrite is and the plug-in is already registered.
Deletes a serializer plug-in from the registry.
Only fully trusted callers can use this method.

The method will interpret a registered plug-in as the same one passed to this method only if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor"></xref> for the plug-in.
serializerDescriptor is null.
The plug-in is not registered.
See **Remarks**.
